casebody.data:
Board of Education of the Olentangy Local School District, Appellant, v. Delaware County Board of Revision et al., Appellees.

[Cite as Bd. of Edn. of the Olentangy Local School Dist. v. Delaware Cty. Bd. of Revision, 111 Ohio St.3d 1213, 2006-Ohio-5605.]

*1214(No. 2005-2340 Submitted August 9, 2006 Decided November 1, 2006.) Rich, Crites & Dittmer, L.L.C., Mark H. Gillis, Jeffrey A. Rich, and Kelley A. Gorry, for appellant. Sleggs, Danzinger & Gill Co., L.P.A., and Robert K. Danzinger, for appellee 8288 Green Meadows Drive (Columbus) Associates, L.L.C.

{¶ 1} The appeal is dismissed, sua sponte, on the authority of Olympic Steel, Inc. v. Cuyahoga Cty. Bd. of Revision, 110 Ohio St.3d 1242, 2006-Ohio-4091, 852 N.E.2d 178.

Moyer, C.J., Resnick, Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor, O’Donnell and Lanzinger, JJ., concur. Pfeifer, J.,

dissents for the reason stated in his dissent in Olympic Steel, Inc. v. Cuyahoga Cty. Bd. of Revision, 110 Ohio St.3d 1242, 2006-Ohio-4091, 852 N.E.2d 178, ¶ 5.
